original_title: Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Jesus Chavez
overview: Making the eighth and final defense of the WBC Super Featherweight Championship, Floyd Mayweather Jr. saves his most entertaining performance for last when he meets Jesus Chavez head on in San Francisco. Chavez makes Mayweather work but is eventually lit up by combinations from the champion. Mayweather gets the knockout when the battered challenger fails to answer the bell for the tenth round.
title: Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Jesus Chavez
